meanings.definition: Vanadiates: to treat or combine with vanadium
meanings.sent1: She vanadiates the metal to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: The scientist vanadiates the solution to create a new compound.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to vanadiate the dish with a hint of vanadium for a unique flavor twist.
meanings.sent4: His determination vanadiates his actions, making him unstoppable.
meanings.sent5: The magic potion vanadiates the ordinary object into something extraordinary.

meanings.sent1: The lab technician studied the vanadiates under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Vanadiates are commonly used in industrial applications.
meanings.sent3: The collection of vanadiates on the shelf caught the eye of the curious student.
meanings.sent4: The vanadiates in the solution glowed like tiny stars in the dark laboratory.
meanings.sent5: The jewelry designer crafted a stunning necklace using rare vanadiates.
